quotes.quote: I don’t need anyone. Because I can do every single thing that a person in a relationship can. Everything. Even zip up my own dress. You know, there are some things that are actually harder to do with two people. Such as monologues.
quotes.advice: Don't base your self worth on others!

quotes.quote: Who hasn't made mistakes? I once French-kissed a dog at a party to try to impress what turned out to be a very tall 12-year-old.
quotes.advice: Don't let mistakes hold you back! Nobody's perfect!

quotes.quote: Living a lie will eat you up inside. Like that parasite I got from eating sushi on Amtrak.
When a child doesn’t see his father enough, he starts to jump up and down, then his mood level will drop until he pees himself.
quotes.advice: Be there for those you love!

quotes.quote: Here’s a little bedroom tip. Put a bag of popcorn in the microwave beforehand. That way, when you’re done, you have a treat!
quotes.advice: In life and in love, it's always best to be prepared!

quotes.quote: Do you need sex advice? Here's a tip. Sometimes a lady likes to leave her blazer on.
quotes.advice: Some times it helps to spice things up!

quotes.quote: All of humankind has one thing in common: the sandwich. I believe that all anyone really wants in this life is to sit in peace and eat a sandwich.
quotes.advice: Here is the real meaning of life:

quotes.quote: That word bums me out unless it’s between the words meat and pizza.
If reality TV has taught us anything, it's that you can't keep people with no shame down.
Rejection from society is what created the X-Men.
quotes.advice: Don't care about what others think of you!

quotes.quote: No, it OK. Don’t be cry.
If I could press a button and five people in the world would die, but I'd get free cable for life, I'd do it.
quotes.advice: Life is easier when you know who you are!

quotes.quote: I want to roll my eyes right now, but the doctor says that, if I keep doing it, my ocular muscles might spasm and eject my eyeballs.
You didn't realize emotion could be a weapon? Have you not read the poetry of Jewel?
quotes.advice: Know your strengths and how to use them!

quotes.quote: One of my New Year's resolutions is to say 'yes.' Yes to love, yes to life, yes to staying in more.
You wanna party? It’s $500 for kissing and $10,000 for snuggling; end of list.
